titleStmt.title: The King of France his nevv order to his subjects professing the Protestant religion at Charenton forbidding them to use several exprressions, contained in their publick prayers, and confession of faith : and commanding them to redress divers other pretended grievances.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV)
